Hello there, i m with a strange problem, when  my "excel" , it shows the code...

This also appens when i run the examples 01simple-download-xls 01simple-download-xlsx.php, but i opens well in 01simple-download-pdf.php ... Can t figure out whats the problem

 

this is from the examples.
Well i figure that is a encode issue ... wamp download utf 8 files, anyone had this problem?
After searching for some hours, i realize the only thing i needed, was to encode my file with utf-8 without BOM. Hope this help someone in the future.
